ygData.subject: Re: Is this list still up?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Archon Temple has more Crusader spawn points than any other. But it is all random. I have spent literally 16 hours in that camp straight, with only 1
ygData.messageBody:
--- Atrocity <atrocity_apocalypse@...> wrote:
> It's been a very long time since I've posted to this
> list. I started a shadowknight on Bertoxulous and
> got
> him to 16 when I left to restart on Tallon. I've
> moved Atrocity up to level 31 on Tallon, and also
> have
> a level 16 wiz there, just for fun.
>
> I know that we have a lot of seasoned shadowknights
> on
> this list, and there were many times when I read the
> posts thinking, oh, this will be useful when I'm
> 30+...
>
> Well, the big challenge for me right now is
> Darkforged
> Armor. I'm getting ready to move into Cazic Thule
> to
> start collecting this. I've already picked up 2
> pieces of melatite, 1 fairy dust, and 1 Qeynos
> shield,
> so I really need to work on the decayed drops.
>
> Anyone have some good tips for me on getting this
> stuff? I've heard that the 4 corners spot through
> the
> maze is the most likely place to find the crusaders.
>
> When I look at this on the map, I get shivers. From
> what I can tell it looks like if anything goes wrong
> in there and you're not a class that can gate,
> you've
> had it. I just can't see anyone running from 4
> corners all the way through the maze and making it
> to
> the zone. I don't have a wiz in my party, so group
> evac isn't much of an option. I know that I can try
> feign and invis, but this still makes me nervous.
>
> Any and all advice on acquiring decayed armor is
> greatly appreciated.
>
> PS. for sol b and fire giants, the best info I've
> see
> is at http://monks.volitionx.com/monkzones.htm it's
> amazingly good for a monk.
>
> Atrocity
>
> --- Matt Price <mattren@...> wrote:
> > Well I just found out there was a list about
> amonth
> > ago and this thread is
> > the first one i have received so I'll introduce
> > myself.
> >
> > I just got 47 with Squiggles, My Troll SK on
> Vallon
> > Zek. I am the leader of
> > <Da Bashin' Iggles>. My guild and our allies are
> > preparing for a dragon
> > raid in a month at the max. Tried Fire Giants for
> > the first time on
> > Saturday night, did ok on the first 3, but got
> > massacred after that. Anyone
> > got any tips on FG's, dragons, or breaking into
> the
> > Planes? Pulling
> > locations for FG's would be most beneficial at
> this
> > time.
> >
> > Let me remind you that this is Race War PvP server
> > so we are an al evil
> > team guild, as are our allies. So we don't have
> > bards or monks.
> >
> > thanks in advance,
> >
> > Squiggles Jiggles
> > lvl 47 TSK
> > leader of Da Bashin' Iggles
> >
> > www.ciab.net/iggles
> >
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Talk to your friends online with Yahoo! Messenger.
> http://im.yahoo.com
>


The Archon Temple has more Crusader spawn points than
any other. But it is all random. I have spent
literally 16 hours in that camp straight, with only 1
or 2 Crusader spawns. While the UTR, which has only 1
or 2 potential spawn points, were dropping Decaying
like mad.

So its all luck.. pick a spot and hope for the best.

Bathory D'Allatu
50 Human Shadowknight
Cazic-Thule



=====
Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
Bathory D'Allatu
Cazic-Thule
